mutants.code:
def restore_initial_array(text: str) -> list[int]:
    ans = 1
    initial_array = []
    for char in text:
        t = bin(ord(char))[2:][::-1]
        k = int(t + '0' * (8 - len(t)), 2)
        initial_array.append((ans - k) % 256)
        ans = k
    return initial_array
